page.title: 09Manufacturing
page.content: Our area has various manufacturing companies.They are{:Wilcroft Plastics, {John Bull Electrical Company,Stanway {Screens,Woodwards,Merrits,Draper's {Bakery and Emspray.Wilcroft}make plastic goods and employ 6 people.John Bull's company make{test equipment}and employ 15 people.Stanway Screens make {windows for caravans and mobile homes and employ 35 people. Woodwards make {babies'nursery soft}goods and employ 15 people.Merrits make{aircraft {components}and other things,and employ 32 people.Draper's make{bread,buns, {rolls etc}and employ 6 people.Emspray make{perfume sprays}and employ 3 people Altogether the manufacturing companies employ 112 people,men and women.Merrits are subcontractors and make about Â£1500 worth of goods a day.
